name: Flushed: Flop's Revenge
description:
WASDMOVE /STRAFEMOUSELOOK
LEFT CLICKSHOOTRIGHT CLICKAIM (TRUE IRON SIGHTS)MIDDLE CLICKINVERT Y AXIS (for JoshMcLean)ESCAPEQUIT GAME INSTANTLY

Go on a journey to the center of the sewage system as a bad ass gun wielding goldfish named FLOP! This goldfish is going to make whoever flushed him down the tubes beg for mercy while killing every mother flipper that stands in his way.

This is a remake of my WGJ 28 game "Down the Tubes 3D". The original game was made in GameMaker Studio 1.4 and was my first ever 3D game. I've learned a lot since making that original game and have decide to remake it using Unity. The game is still in its early stages of development.

Looking for feedback on this weeks game before the jam ends. All gameplay features are complete and I'm moving on to building levels, menus and adding music and additional sfx. Please have a look.
